title: Question 1
question: Where is the abdominal cavity located:

options.label: It is located in the infra-thoracic region on the dorsal part of the body
It is located in the upper chest and in the ventral part of the body
It is located between the thoracic diaphragm and the upper opening of the pelvis
It is located between the thoracic diaphragm and the lower opening of the pelvis

title: Question 2
question: Among the alternatives below, which does not correspond to regions of the abdomen:

options.label: Central hypochondrium, lower iliac fossa and upper flank
Left hypochondrium, left iliac fossa and right flank
Mesogastrium, left flank and right iliac fossa

title: Question 3
question: How many quadrants is the abdomen divided?

title: Question 4
question: Which of the following structures are located in the upper left quadrant of the abdomen?

options.label: Sigmoid neck, right ovary and head of the pancreas
Gallbladder, Right Kidney, Right lobe of the liver
Left uterine tube, cecum and left ovary

title: Question 5
question: Which of the following structures are located in the upper right quadrant of the abdomen (QSE)?

options.label: Gallbladder, left kidney and sigmoid neck
Spleen, left lobe of the liver and stomach

title: Question 6
question: Of the following structures, which are located in the lower right quadrant of the abdomen (QID)?

options.label: Cecum, vermiform appendix and right uterine tube
Pancreas, left ovary and left kidney
Right kidney, spleen and sigmoid neck
Left spermatic cord, left kidney and left ovary

title: Question 7
question: Of the following structures, which are located in the lower left quadrant of the abdomen (QIE)?

options.label: Left ovary, cecum and vermiform appendix
Right kidney, pancreas and right uterine tube
Sigmoid colon, left ovary and lower part of the descending colon

title: Question 8
question: Of the muscles below, which one belongs to the abdomen?

title: Question 9
question: Which muscles make up the antero-lateral abdominal wall?

options.label: Pectoralis minor muscle, Rectus abdominis muscle and Pyramidal muscle
External oblique, pyramidal, rhomboid and pectoralis major
Serratus muscle, Rectus abdominis muscle and Internal oblique muscle
External Oblique Muscle, Internal Oblique Muscle, Transverse Muscle of the abdomen and Rectus Muscle of the abdomen

title: Question 10
question: Which of the following nerves does not reverse the anterolateral abdominal wall?

title: Question 11
question: Of the followeing arteries, which does not participate in the vascularization of the antero-lateral abdomial wall?

title: Question 12
question: What is the main occupant of the inguinal canal in men and women respectively:

options.label: Inguinal ligament and Round ligament of the uterus
Spermatic cord and Round ligament of the uterus
Deep inguinal ring and superficial inguinal ring
Spermatic cord and superficial inguinal ring

title: Question 13
question: The peritoneum consists of two continuous laminae, namely:

title: Question 14
question: Which of the following structures is not an abdominal viscera?

title: Question 15
question: The stomach is divided into 04 main parts, which are:

options.label: Upper, lower, lateral and central portions

title: Question 16
question: The small intestine consists of:

title: Question 17
question: The large intestine is subdivided into:

options.label: Cecum, appendix, ascending, descending, transverse, sigmoid colons; rectum and anal canal
Ilio, Cecum, appendix, ascending, descending, transverse and sigmoid colons
Ilio, ascending, descending, transverse and sigmoid colons
Cecum, appendix, jejunum, rectum and anal canal

title: Question 18
question: McBurney's point is located:

options.label: Located between the antero-superior iliac crest and the medial portion of the right flank
Located between the navel and the right anterior superior iliac spine
Located between the navel and the left anterior superior iliac spine
Located between the antero-superior iliac crest and the medial portion of the left flank

title: Question 19
question: The pancreas is subdivided into:

title: Question 20
question: Which of the following organs is the largest organ in the abdominal cavity?
